a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Projected world population by level of education
Shown is the medium (SSP2) projection by the Wittgenstein Centre for Demography and Global Human
Capital. The authors of this projection describe it as their "middle of the road scenario that can also be
seen as the most likely path".
